tool.name: Remove contamination
tool.description: from FASTA sequences, utilizing the UniVec Database
tool.help:
**What it does**
Removes contamination from FASTA sequences, utilizing the UniVec Database. If the resulting, stripped, contig has a length lower than 200, we skip it.
-----
**Params**
- FASTA file FASTA input file, can contain gaps in the sequence
- output FASTA output file, cleaned from contaminations
